title: ****9/1 COMM AVE-PACKARDS CORNER LARGE 3BED/1.5 BA STEPS TO BU & MBTA!
map_address: Commonwealth Ave near Saint Luke's Rd
posting_body: A very spacious, and updated 3 bed/1.5 bath rental apartment located on Commonwealth Ave in Packard's Corner Boston.

The unit is located in a professionally managed building that is located just steps to the MBTA Green Line,  Boston University, Harvard Ave, Brookline & Beacon St, Longwood Medical, Boston Landing, and Boston College!
Heat and Hot Water are included in the rent price and there is shared laundry in the building.
Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!
Bus: 66 Harvard Ave @ Commonwealth Ave (0.22 mi)
Bus: 57 Brighton Ave @ Comm Ave (0.09 mi)
Bus: 64 Cambridge St @ Linden St (0.42 mi)
